original: Jeppsson, Hilda Dagny Torborg, prakt, läkare, Trollhättan, f. 25/9/05 i Gbg av Carl J. o. Hilda Svensson. Adopt:dtr: Gun Lilian f. 39. — Stud:-ex. i Gbg 24, med. kand. i Lund 28, med. lic. där 35. Assist :läk. v. Gbgs barnsjukh. nio mån. 36-37, vik. und:-läk. v. Kroppefjälls o. Sjö-Gunnarsbo sanat. tre mån. samma tid, dito v. Flens’burgska vårdanst. somr. 36 o. 37, tf. prov:läk. i Norbergs distr. två mån. 36, vik. und :läk. v. Lillhagens sjukh. fem mån. 37-38, tf. und:läk. v. Flensburgska vårdanst. 38-39, tf. andre und iiläk. v. Vänersborgs las. med. avd. 39, ord. andre o. förste und:-läk. där 39-42, und :läk. v. Flensburgska vårdanst. 42-43, aman. v. pediatr. klin. i Lund 43-44, prakt. läk. i Trollhättan sed. 44.
translated: Jeppsson, Hilda Dagny Torborg, nurse, doctor, Trollhättan, born September 25, 1905 in Gothenburg to Carl J. and Hilda Svensson. Adopted daughter: Gun Lilian, born in 1939. Completed high school in Gothenburg in 1924, obtained a Bachelor of Medicine degree in Lund in 1928, and a medical license there in 1935. Worked as an assistant doctor at the children's hospital in Gothenburg for nine months in 1936-1937, temporary resident doctor at Kroppefjälls and Sjö-Gunnarsbo sanatorium for three months during the same period, and also at Flens'burgska vårdanstalt (nursing home) during the summer of 1936 and 1937. Temporary substitute doctor in Norbergs district for two months in 1936, substitute resident doctor at Lillhagens hospital for five months in 1937-1938, temporary resident doctor at Flens'burgska vårdanstalt from 1938 to 1939. Temporary second resident and first resident doctor at Vänersborgs hospital's medical department in 1939-1942, resident doctor at Flens'burgska vårdanstalt from 1942 to 1943, assistant at the pediatric clinic in Lund from 1943 to 1944, and practicing doctor in Trollhättan since 1944.
